recipesJson.name: Screwed Super Strudel
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
You know which Strawberry Strudel I'm talking about.
Cheesecake (LA) can be substituted by (FW) and lower the Super Sweet if it's not your thing.
Enjoy & comment,
Screwdriver

reviews.text: Dude, I've probably mixed 3000ml of this stuff for my wife since I let her try it a few months back. This is something special here and I apologize for not rating this sooner. I'll probably will end up mixing up a 55 gallon drum of this and just be done with it. If I can make a mix that she will put this Strudel down for, then I will then be a true mixer, but so far she's vaping nothing but this... great job.
